abstract: New-York Historical Society is hosting exhibit Campaigning for the Presidency, 1960-1972: Selections from the Museum of Democracy; collection of posters, fliers and other items shows artful ways candidates promoted themselves before advent of social media.

headline.main: A Blast from Campaigns Past ... A Grab Bag of Vintage Swag

keywords.value: Campaigning for the Presidency, 1960-1972: Selections from the Museum of Democracy (Exhibit)
keywords.name: creative_works

snippet: The New-York Historical Society is exhibiting memorabilia from four presidential campaigns, including items that were watchable, wearable, drinkable and playable....
lead_paragraph: The New-York Historical Society is exhibiting memorabilia from four presidential campaigns, including items that were watchable, wearable, drinkable and playable.
